definition: to die suddenly
surname Bao
sudden/violent/cruel/to show or expose/to injure
to die/to shoot dead/to reject/to fall forward/(suffix) to death
to collapse/variant of 斃|毙[bi4]/variant of 獙[bi4]

sentences.english: The nightmare is really effective, some people die a violent death mystically, some people are murdered strangely.
sentences.chinese: 噩梦果真灵验，有人神秘暴毙，有人离奇遇害。

sentences.english: A footballer died suddenly on the field, which shocked millions of people.
sentences.chinese: 某球员暴毙球场，让人惊讶和意外。

sentences.english: Later, you hire a consultant to analyse why the cow dropped dead.
sentences.chinese: 之后你请顾问来分析为何母牛暴毙。

sentences.english: She was deeply shocked by her husband's sudden death.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫的暴毙使她深受打击。

definition: sudden attack of a serious illness
die of sudden illness/die suddenly
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
to die by violence
see 一命嗚呼|一命呜呼[yi1 ming4 wu1 hu1]
death of king or emperor/demise
violent death (idiom); to die in a disaster/an unnatural death
to die/to perish
to fall ill and die/to die of illness
to die
to fall gravely ill, never to recover (idiom)
to die
to meet violent death/to get killed
to die tragically/to meet with a violent death
news of sb's death
to be attacked by an assassin
